      • showProteinFromMasterdata

        public void showProteinFromMasterdata​(PdbToDpdMasterdata aMasterdata)
                               throws DpdPeptideException
        Displays given protein. Not active chains are hidden. Rotation is applied. The protein is centered on screen.
        Parameters:
        aMasterdata - PdbToDPD masterdata object.
        Throws:
        DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException
